rows.label: bf09200100_0020
rows.name:
What do I see?
I see a bunch of people struggling to stay alive.

rows.label: bf09200100_0030
rows.name: Same as almost everyone else on Alst right now.

rows.label: bf09200100_0040
rows.name: Zeke. Have you ever taken a person's life?

rows.label: bf09200100_0050
rows.name:
Can't say I have.
Never seen the need for it, myself.

rows.label: bf09200100_0080
rows.name:
Because they're in your way, or
because you can't bear the sight of 'em.

rows.label: bf09200100_0100
rows.name:
But I'm not weak.
So I don't need to kill anyone.

rows.label: bf09200100_0110
rows.name: And I don't mean physically, yeah?

rows.label: bf09200100_0130
rows.name: I suppose...that makes me weak, then.

rows.label: bf09200100_0140
rows.name: But that weakness is why I'm standing here today...
